and more than books

Conversations, Readings,
and Performances

ALOUD Featuring LA's top writers, thinkers and performers.

Helping people realize
their potential

What We Fund Programs that impact literacy, the imagination, and lifelong learning.

Transforming Los Angeles through the power of learning

About Us Strengthening and supporting the Los Angeles Public Library.

Eclectic and literary
gifts and goods

The Library Store Visit our brick and mortar store or our mobile truck.

The Library Foundation of Los Angeles provides critical support to the Los Angeles Public Library resulting in free programs, resources, and services available to the millions of adults, children, and youth of Los Angeles.
